imdb.plot outline: Walkley award-winning investigative journalist and war correspondent Peter Greste embarks on a journey to demystify the story of Australia's Great War hero, Sir John Monash. While examining the battles that made Monash famous, Peter also discovers his own family's previously unknown role in Monash's First Australian Imperial Force. For Peter, Monash's war becomes personal.
imdb.title: Monash and Me: Peter Greste on Australia's Great Commander
akas: Monash and Me: Peter Greste on Australia's Great Commander (Australia)
plot: Walkley award-winning investigative journalist and war correspondent Peter Greste embarks on a journey to demystify the story of Australia's Great War hero, Sir John Monash. While examining the battles that made Monash famous, Peter also discovers his own family's previously unknown role in Monash's First Australian Imperial Force. For Peter, Monash's war becomes personal.::Artemis Media
